function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implement proper waste management and disposal procedures, and evaluate advanced microwave technologies with no residues or toxic wastes","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Ensuring thorough and complete incineration processes, implementing secondary combustion chambers","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strict adherence to recommended treatment protocols, regular monitoring and testing for of total users)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use emission control technologies to minimize air pollutants and greenhouse gas emissions","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Strict protocols for handling and separate disposal methods for explosive and radioactive waste","category":"Environmental parameters control","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use additional measures such as physical disinfection to complement uvc disinfection","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Consider factors such as amount of waste, costs, maintenance, and types of waste when selecting disinfection technologies","category":"Maintenance / radiation and regular maintenance of uv disinfection systems to ensure effectiveness.","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use a safe and sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Precipitate and filter the salt solution before adding it to the sodium hypochlorite generator","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water
